author: jkosin
msg: OPENNLP-113: added setting of the path based on the extraction of the short path name to the batch file ie: \home\j\bin\ then adding a .. getting us up a directory level, lastly OPENNLP_HOME is used for the \lib\opennlp-tools-*.jar file specifying the location.
